lead_paragraph: The Atlanta Hawks were a work in progress much of the season, a team that went from relying on a dazzling, spread-the-ball offense to a grittier, defensive-minded bunch.

headline.print_headline: Hawks Get Another Playoff Shot at King James and Cavaliers
headline.main: Hawks Get Another Playoff Shot at King James and Cavaliers
